*   Table 2 ("Clinical features of patients with p.D620N mutation") lists patient BIII-8 with an "Age at disease onset (y)" of 55 and a "Disease duration (y)" of 2. There is no field or information regarding age at death.

Therefore, the age at which patient 'BIII-8' died is not provided in the document.
